definition: the act of improving by renewing and restoring, make repairs, renovations, revisions or adjustments to
details:
noun
- the act of improving by renewing and restoring
= synonyms: renovation
- periodic maintenance on a car or machine
= example: periodic maintenance on a car or machine
= synonyms: service
verb
- make repairs, renovations, revisions or adjustments to
= example: make repairs, renovations, revisions or adjustments to
= synonyms: modernize, modernise
- travel past
= synonyms: pass
